attributes.action: Music performers should have the vaccine or disclose if they have had it or not.
attributes.additional_details: I work in social care and attend concerts with my children.  I am vaccinated and I find it incredible that some performers (e.g. Justin Bieber) are allowed to not even disclose whether they have had the vaccine and still perform. It's in the public's interest for them to disclose their status so people can make a choice and it is unacceptable to expect us to have it in our roles but then allow a stadium of people to get together with people who are refusing it.
attributes.background: Force performers to either have the vaccine (or at least disclose their vaccine status) prior to performing in the UK to give people a choice to attend safely or not.
